forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 16C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High near 60F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low near 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low near 50F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 14C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 58F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 8C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 47F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 57F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 9C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 48F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 14C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 56F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 9C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low 48F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High 16C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sun and a few passing clouds. High 63F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 49F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 18C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High 66F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 11C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 51F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 16C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 62F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low near 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low 51F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A shower or two possible early with partly cloudy skies in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Chance of a shower or two during the morning, followed by partly cloudy skies in the afternoon. High 61F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low around 10C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 51F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds later in the day. High 17C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 63F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 48F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.
